title: The Charming
description: Novel (50,000 words)Genre(s): Contemporary, Gay Paranormal ThrillerThe shadow of a past love had blinded Clayton MacAllister until his life was slipping through his fingers. Just as Clay was ready to give up on the idea that he might ever be happy, a charming stranger stepped into his life. Mal was rich, handsome and persuasive; everything Clay thought he couldn’t have and didn’t deserve. Mal’s sadistic desires made Clay uncomfortable, but it seemed like a price he could pay—until he learned the price might be his very soul in chains. (M/M - For content labels and excerpt, see details on publisher's site.)
author: J.A. Jaken
